channel.title: Applied Deep Learning and Artificial Intelligence on Social / Business Data Science 2023
channel.description: Recent content in Applied Deep Learning and Artificial Intelligence on Social / Business Data Science 2023

item.title: Group Assignment 1
item.description: Portfolio Exercise 1 Introduction In this assignment, you are required to delve into the practical aspects of Deep Learning by constructing and evaluating a neural network using PyTorch. This exercise is designed to deepen your understanding of neural network architectures, hyperparameter tuning, and the preprocessing steps necessary for effective model training and evaluation. You will have the freedom to choose a dataset from either the M1 or M2 module or select an external dataset that intrigues you.

item.title: Intro to Traditional Deep Learning
item.description: This session provides an overview of the foundational elements of deep learning, including its historical context, key concepts, and practical applications. The course will delve into various types of neural networks, outlining their advantages and disadvantages. It will specifically focus on convolutional neural networks (CNNs), recurrent neural networks (RNNs), and long short-term memory (LSTM) networks, highlighting their unique characteristics and applicability to a range of problem-solving scenarios, including those in economics.
